files.patch:
@@ -2092,8 +2092,0 @@
-### My library uses "preview features": how do I specify the necessary options?
-
-Set `enablePreview=true` in the `LIBRARY.properties` file in the root directory
-of the library (the directory specified in the `@library` tag.)
-
-Note that if a library uses preview features, any tests that use the library
-will be assumed to need preview features enabled as well.
-

@@ -248,7 +248,0 @@ - -

Configuration information for a library may be specified in a file named -LIBRARY.properties in the root directory of -the library. A library may be specified to use preview features, -in which case the appropriate compile-time and runtime options will be -provided automatically. This extends to any tests that may use the library. - @@ -1039,13 +1032,0 @@ -

LIBRARY.properties

- -Configuration properties for a library may be in a file named LIBRARY.properties -in the root directory of the library (that is, the directory specified in a -@library tag. - -The following property is available: - -
-
enablePreview <true|false> -
Specify whether the classes in this library use preview features and that -the necessary compile-time and run-time options should be provided automatically. -
